compliance_assessment.framework_description: International standard for information security management systems (ISMS) focusing on risk management and control implementation.

requirements.requirement: Implement appropriate security controls to protect information assets.
requirements.evidence: Controls like encrypted configuration store (CTL002) and MFA (CTL001) are planned but not yet implemented.
gaps: Missing implementation of controls for data minimization and access certification
recommendations: Prioritize implementation of all planned security controls

requirements.requirement: Maintain documented information security policies and procedures.
requirements.evidence: No documentation evidence for security controls or incident response processes
recommendations: Create and maintain security policy documentation

critical_gaps: Lack of documentation for compliance requirements
remediation_plan: Implement all planned security controls (CTL001-CTL005) within 90 days
Establish access certification and audit processes
